mapper.insert: insert into dream_member (member_no, member_mail, member_pass, member_name, member_birth,member_gender) values (dream_member_seq.nextval, #{member_mail}, #{member_pass}, #{member_name}, #{member_birth}, #{member_gender})
mapper.update: update dream_member set member_pass = #{member_pass} where member_mail = #{member_mail}
mapper.select: select member_mail, to_date(member_regdate,'yyyy-mm-dd') as member_regdate from dream_member where member_name = #{member_name} and member_birth = #{member_birth} order by member_regdate desc
